item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: totalthememain
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" column_spacing="30" bg_style="stretch" css=".vc_custom_1609807999192{border-top-width: 0px !important;border-right-width: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 0px !important;padding-top: 90px !important;background: #41a8ff url(https://total.wpexplorer.com/appy/wp-content/uploads/sites/48/2015/02/team.jpg?id=18) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-left-color: #2187de !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #2187de !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #2187de !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #2187de !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_image image_id="8"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vcex_spacing size="70px" visibility="visible-desktop"][vcex_icon icon_type="linecons" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-lab" custom_size="60px" color="#ffffff" width="100px" height="100px" border_radius="100px" border="6px solid #fff"][vcex_spacing][vcex_heading text="Turn that frown upside down." font_weight="normal" color="#ffffff" font_family="Lato" font_size="d:36|tl:30|tp:24|pl:24|pp:24"][vcex_heading text="#E-8_Q29tZSUyMG9uJTJDJTIwJTNDc3BhbiUyMGNsYXNzJTNEJTIyd3BleC1iZy1hY2NlbnQlMjB3cGV4LXB4LTUlMjIlM0VnZXQlMjBBcHB5JTNDJTJGc3BhbiUzRS4=" font_weight="normal" color="#ffffff" font_family="Lato" font_size="d:36|tl:30|tp:24|pl:24|pp:24"][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vc_column_text color="#ffffff" font_size="18"]Our app is the perfect solution. Whether you need to find a restaurant, send your mom a card, set a reminder or something else just use Appy. It can do anything.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top="45px"][vc_column][vcex_heading text="The app that does just about everything." bottom_margin="10px" tag="h2" text_align="center" font_size="24px" font_weight="bold" color="#005ba7"][vc_column_text]

We built in tons of great features that you're sure to love.
We're onto something here - check it out.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing][vcex_multi_buttons buttons="%5B%7B%22text%22%3A%22App%20Store%20%5Bticon%20icon%3D%5C%22apple%5C%22%20margin_left%3D%5C%2210px%5C%22%5D%22%2C%22link%22%3A%22url%3Ahttp%253A%252F%252Fapple.com%7Ctarget%3A_blank%22%2C%22css_animation%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22style%22%3A%22flat%22%2C%22local_scroll%22%3A%22false%22%2C%22download_attribute%22%3A%22false%22%7D%2C%7B%22text%22%3A%22Google%20Play%20%5Bticon%20icon%3D%5C%22play%5C%22%20margin_left%3D%5C%2210px%5C%22%5D%22%2C%22link%22%3A%22url%3Ahttps%253A%252F%252Fplay.google.com%252Fstore%7Ctarget%3A_blank%22%2C%22css_animation%22%3A%22none%22%2C%22style%22%3A%22flat%22%2C%22local_scroll%22%3A%22false%22%2C%22download_attribute%22%3A%22false%22%7D%5D" font_weight="500"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1489542321252{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 0px !important;padding-top: 45px !important;background-color: #fbfbfb !important;border-left-color: #f1f1f1 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #f1f1f1 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #f1f1f1 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #f1f1f1 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column][vc_single_image image="19" alignment="center" lightbox_iframe_type="video_embed" lightbox_video="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2JyW4yAyTl0"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top="45px"][vc_column][vcex_heading text="It's as easy as 1, 2, 3, 4..." bottom_margin="10px" tag="h2" text_align="center" font_size="24px" font_weight="bold" color="#005ba7"][vc_column_text]

Download the app. Sign up for an account.
Do things. Then to more things.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="45px" visibility="hidden-phone"][vcex_image_grid responsive_columns="false" thumbnail_link="none" visibility="hidden-phone" img_width="226" img_height="9999" image_ids="9,10,11,12"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" wpex_bg_overlay="dark" css=".vc_custom_1609808125906{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 10px !important;background: #2496e2 url(https://total.wpexplorer.com/appy/wp-content/uploads/sites/48/2015/02/team.jpg?id=18) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}" wpex_bg_overlay_opacity=".3"][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Any Device" icon_type="linecons" heading_weight="normal" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-phone" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_size="60" heading_letter_spacing="1px" css=".vc_custom_1426794415356{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}" heading_color="#ffffff" font_color="#ffffff"]Our app has been developer to work on every mobile device.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Any Place" icon_type="linecons" heading_weight="normal" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-location" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_size="60" heading_letter_spacing="1px" css=".vc_custom_1426794434557{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}" heading_color="#ffffff" font_color="#ffffff"]Access your data no matter where you are in the world.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vcex_icon_box style="two" heading="Any Time" icon_type="linecons" heading_weight="normal" icon_linecons="vc_li vc_li-calendar" icon_color="#ffffff" icon_size="60" heading_letter_spacing="1px" css=".vc_custom_1426794803333{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}" heading_color="#ffffff" font_color="#ffffff"]You can sign upÂ and cancel your membership at anytime.[/vcex_icon_box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top="45px"][vc_column][vcex_heading text="Get Started Today with Appy" bottom_margin="10px" tag="h2" text_align="center" font_size="24px" font_weight="bold" color="#005ba7"][vc_column_text text_align="center"]Don't wait any longer, download the Appy app today![/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing size="20px"][vcex_button url="https://www.wpexplorer.com/out/total" size="small" title="Learn More" align="center" custom_background="#24bf75" border_radius="2px" custom_hover_background="#1c945b"]Get Started[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" receive access to Appy exclusives!" bottom_margin="10px" tag="h2" font_size="24px" font_weight="bold" color="#005ba7" text_align="center"][vc_column_text text_align="center"]You'll be the first to know about updates and more. You know you want to.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing][vcex_newsletter_form form_action="//wpexplorer.us1.list-manage.com/subscribe/post?u=9b7568b7c032f9a6738a9cf4d&id=7056c37ddf" input_align="center" input_width="500px"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
